Teen inflicts ‘severe’ head injuries on 17-day-old baby, doesn’t seek medical help, plays PlayStation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/teen-inflicts-severe-head-injuries-on-17-day-old-baby-doesnt-seek-medical-help-plays-playstation/UR5ZEWPMJNFF3LAN3H43HA3JS4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/teen-inflicts-severe-head-injuries-on-17-day-old-baby-doesnt-seek-medical-help-plays-playstation/UR5ZEWPMJNFF3LAN3H43HA3JS4/ Belinda FeekIt was several hours before the badly injured girl was taken to hospital. Wed, 20 Mar 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Instead of seeking medical assistance for the severely injured 17-day-old baby, Taine Davey played on his PlayStation 4. He then began setting up a trampoline.

Wed, 20 Mar 2024 16:01:00 +0000 The number of new building consents in Tauranga has plummeted, reflecting a national trend and prompting concerns house prices will rise when the city is already grappling with a housing shortage.
